# PLAYER::HAS_PLAYER_BEEN_SPOTTED_IN_STOLEN_VEHICLE

## Summary
Checks if the player has been spotted in a stolen vehicle

## Parameters
* **PLAYER_INDEX** player

## Returns
* **BOOL**

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Checks if the player has been spotted in a stolen vehicle
